card.name: Assault, Onifuda Kingdom!
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 8 or less. :► Put a creature that costs 8 or less from your graveyard. ■ Onitime

card.name: Hyakki no Jaoumon
card.text: ■ Oniend ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. From among the cards put into your graveyard in this way, choose a darkness or fire non-evolution creature that costs 6 or less and put it. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

card.name: Gashadodokuro, Oni of "Soul Hunting"
card.text: ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Onitime ■ At the start of your turn, put one of your shields into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger". ■ Quattro Breaker

card.name: Jaouga, Oniga Great King
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, you may add all your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" abilities.

card.name: Balad Vi Na Shura
card.text: ■ When you would Prevents Defeat ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ File:Oniend.png
